\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 71241}

\subsection*{Helps Alcohol Addiction}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{Just One Guy}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 & 150 mg & oral & Pharms - Trazodone & daily\\
\hline
 T+ 0:00 & 1500 ml & oral & Alcohol - Beer/Wine & daily\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 160.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
My experience with trazodone is very positive.



It helps with my alcohol addiction in that I can consume much less alcohol per day. Before the trazodone, I would need to consume at least 3 liters of, say Chardonnay, at 13\% potency, per day to fall asleep. With 150mg trazodone, I need less than 1.5 liters

to fall asleep. I know that is still a lot of wine, but it helps me not to need so much wine.

\end{document}
